summary: Artificial intelligence is an area of enormous potential for companies and investors . After a few difficult months, AI stocks could resume their 2024 momentum and soar in the second half . Three in particular could lead the way .  Nvidia's revenue surged 69% to $44 billion in the first quarter of the year . The chip giant is making investments in U.S. manufacturing to limit any eventual tariff impact . Nvidia trades for only 33 times forward earnings estimates, down from 50 times just a few months ago .  Trump threatened to impose a 25% tariff on Apple's imported iPhones . Apple has made efforts to diversify its manufacturing, with a plan to move much of it from China to India . All of this has hurt Apple stock, which is down about 20% since the start of the year .  Amazon's performance has been sluggish in recent times amid concerns that tariffs could hurt its e-commerce business and cloud computing unit, Amazon Web Services . The worst-case tariff scenario has been avoided, and the U.S. is making progress on trade agreements . Amazon has revamped its cost structure in recent years after facing pressure from inflation .  Amazon shares trade for 34 times forward earnings estimates, a reasonable level that could prompt investors to buy . AWS has been seeing tremendous growth from its AI efforts, which have helped it reach a $117 billion annual revenue run rate .  The Motley Fool’s total average return is994% — a market-crushing outperformance compared to172% for the S&P 500 . Don’t miss out on the latest top 10 list, available when you joinStock Advisor .

iOS 26 Beta 2 has fixed one of the more glaring issues with Liquid Glass, its new user interface design . Liquid Glass was announced earlier this month at WWDC 2025 . The refreshed user interface modernizes the operating system’s look and feel .  Apple's iOS 26 beta has been updated to address the problem with the Control Center . Notifications in the first beta were also hard to read, as many had pointed out . iOS 26 doesn't launch publicly until the fall, but Apple is listening to user feedback .

Apple is exploring the use of GenAI to accelerate and streamline the design of its custom chips . The chips power the company’s range of devices, such as iPhones, iPads, Mac computers, and the Vision Pro AR headset . Hedge funds say Apple Inc. is one of the best QQQ stocks to buy according to hedge funds .  Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has relied on third-party EDA firms like Cadence Design Systems Inc. and Synopsys Inc. for years . These firms have been actively integrating AI and ML into their offerings . We believe certain AI stocks offer greater upside potential and carry less downside risk .  Monkey Monkey. Monkey . Monkey. monkey . Monkey . monkey . monkey. monkey. Bitcoin's long-held belief as a major volatile asset has been challenged amid the Iran-Israel conflict . On June 21, the United States carried out a strike on Iran, where it bombed three of its main nuclear facilities . Bitcoin's 60-day realized volatility had fallen to approximately 27% to 28%, according to Bitwise Europe's André Dragosch .  In February 2022, Bitcoin hit volatility levels of 60% to 65% during the onset of the Russia-Ukraine conflict, showing a stark difference from the current pattern . Analysts suggest that the difference is mainly attributed to long-term holders and institutional investors . Over 30% of Bitcoin's circulating supply is controlled by just 216 centralized entities .  U.S. aren’t safe in heated global tensions anymore, experts say . This story was originally reported by TheStreet on Jun 23, 2025, where it first appeared .

Ireland plans to use its budget cushion to pump money into infrastructure to protect competitiveness . The small, open economy has a strong fiscal position for now, with a huge budget surplus thanks to corporate tax income from US corporates . Finance Minister Paschal Donohoe said Monday that the government must use that money with an eye on the longer term .  Pharmaceutical tariffs, if imposed by President Donald Trump, could cost the economy 75,000 jobs . Donohoe said Ireland remains attractive destination for investment .  Germany is increasing spending, providing a fiscal boost for the region’s largest economy . Real progress is going to require Europe to do a lot more on improving its capital markets and pools of liquidity .  “We need to be more competitive, we need to invest in innovation," says Polina Hristova, head of Algebris Investments Ireland . “There is definitely the impetus now. Spending and maybe other countries will follow,” she says .
All three major US stock indexes were up in late-morning trading Monday after the US strikes on Syria . The US strikes are the first major US military action to take action in Syria since 2001 .

ALTO Real Estate Funds announced the acquisition of a 24-acre industrial site in Northeast Austin’s Pflugerville submarket . Site benefits from direct proximity to major industrial and tech giants, including Tesla, Samsung, and Apple . Site is strategically located at the intersection of Cameron Road and SH-130 .  The project is strategically positioned within a booming tech and logistics ecosystem . Each facility will feature 32-foot clear heights, 130-foot truck courts, and accommodate up to four tenants per building .  ALTO Real Estate Funds focuses on investing in and developing logistics centers and open-air shopping centers in high-growth U.S. markets . To date, ALTO has acquired 79 properties totaling 15 million square feet and valued at $1.8 billion .

Nasdaq-listed firm DeFi Development Corp. (DFDV) is bringing its equity onto blockchain rails on crypto exchange Kraken . The company's shares will be tokenized under the ticker DFDVx on the Solana network .  "We view the tokenization of our stock as a DeFi lego block, one that developers and institutions can build on top of," said Joseph Onorati, CEO of DeFi Dev. "We have seen incredible demand for access to US equities," said Kraken .
Apple (AAPL) is facing a proposed securities fraud class-action lawsuit filed by shareholders who claim they are victims of a fraud . Apple is accused of fraudulently defrauding shareholders .

Apple was named in a proposed class action lawsuit filed by shareholders in a San Francisco federal court . The lawsuit, covering shareholders who incurred losses in the year ending 9 June, claims that the company's announcements at its June 2024 Worldwide Developers Conference suggested that AI advancements would significantly enhance the iPhone 16 .  The lawsuit names CEO Tim Cook, CFO Kevan Parekh, and former CFO Luca Maestri as defendants alongside the company . Apple did not immediately respond toReuters'requests for comment . Investors are flocking to Chinese markets in a search for alternatives to U.S. equities . Hong Kong’s benchmark Hang Seng Index is up by over 20% so far this year, even as Trump threatened steep tariffs on imports from China . Investors have used the ‘Magnificent 7’—Microsoft, Apple, Alphabet, Amazon, Meta, Nvidia, and Tesla—as shorthand for the top-performing stocks on U.  Goldman Sachs highlights 10 stocks that are best poised for growth in the Chinese market . Unlike the Magnificent 7, these stocks cover more than just tech and AI, extending into retail and other consumer services . The bank predicts that the Prom 10’s earnings will grow by an average of 13% annually over the next two years .  Tencent is Asia’s second-most valuable company, behind chipmaker TSMC . E-commerce giant Alibaba is also on the Prom 10, thanks to optimism around AI .  BYD, the world’s largest producer of electric vehicles, and Xiaomi, also hold spots in Goldman Sachs’ “Prom 10” Chinese EVs are winning over customers both in China and overseas . Midea Group is one of China's leading manufacturers of home appliances .  Behind Nike and Adidas, Adidas is the world's second-biggest sports brand . Nike is the only major sports brand to compete with Adidas and Nike in the world .
Apple (AAPL) and Meta Platforms (Meta Platforms) comment on Apple's iOS software platform . Apple and Meta platforms have been working together for years to work with Apple .

Jabil Inc. was a notable standout in a relatively quiet earnings lineup this week . Jabil is one of the largest global suppliers of electronics manufacturing services and is worthy of investors' attention after posting strong results for its fiscal third quarter on Tuesday .  Jabil has surpassed the Zacks EPS Consensus for 21 consecutive quarters with an average earnings surprise of 6.68% over the last four quarters . The company has made significant efforts to diversify its customer base, with other noteworthy and diverse clients being healthcare giantJohnson & Johnsonand communication networks leaderEricsson .  Year to date, Jabil stock is up over +40% and has blown away the performance of the broader indexes . Jabil expects to see continued revenue expansion, margin enhancement, and robust free cash flow generation in the coming years . Despite vastly outperforming the broader market, JBL trades at a slight discount to the benchmark at 22.9X forward earnings .  Jabil is on track to generate over $1.2 billion in free cash flow this year and has a healthy balance sheet with debt to core EBITDA levels of approximately 1.4X. following its strong Q3 results for fiscal 2025 and FY26 . Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights NVIDIA NVDA, Apple AAPL, Alphabet GOOGL, Meta Platforms META and Advanced Micro Devices AMD . CEO Jensen Huang has forecast spending on AI-enabled data centers will double to $2 trillion over the next four to five years .  NVIDIA's DGX-1 is a mini supercomputer about the size of a college dorm fridge and it held 8 Volta GPUs with 21 billion transistors each . Jensen also retells the story of the first supercomputer in 2016 .  Last Friday's The Week in AI: The Reasoning Wars, Sam's Love Letter, Zuck's Land Grab . Apple researchers found some limitations where the models "give up" on large problems without enough context . I've experienced this with some of the "vibe-coding" app developer tools like Replit and Bolt . But then other papers quickly responded and surfaced with the "limitations" of the Apple research . Company Wants to Take Your Job" Marc Andreessen: "All incumbents are gonna get nuked. Everything gets rebuilt"  Cooker's Rant of the WEEK: "The Magical AI Transformation Won't Be So Gentle" Cooker: The best-case future is a "symbiosis between people and AI" -- where machines handle the mundane, and humans live more interesting lives .  The Week in AI is a look at the "not-so-gentle" transition we are headed into . In the X Space replay and the comments below it, I discuss the implications of "post-labor economics" In this way, AI can move quickly beyond issues of personal safety, to those of economic security .  Both Apple and Google are introducing heavyweight category wearables later this year . We will judge them by who has the best AI inside . Google, today, looks like it is way ahead and pulling further away .  Zuck splunked down $14.3 billion for 49% of a private company called Scale AI . The price tag made it the biggest pure-AI acquisition of OpenAI's $6 billion purchase of Jony Ive's company .  Scale AI is a San Francisco-based artificial intelligence company founded in 2016 . The company specializes in providing high-quality data labeling, annotation, and model evaluation services that are essential for training advanced AI models .  AMD CEO Lisa Su projected an 80% increase in AI inference demand by 2026 . Helios AI Rack-scale architecture supporting up to 72 MI400 GPUs, with 432GB of HBM4 memory per GPU . Available in 2026, this is clearly an answer to NVIDIA's GB200/300 series rack systems .  OpenAI will use AMD GPUs and Helios servers for advanced AI workloads, including ChatGPT . Microsoft Azure runs proprietary and open-source models on AMD Instinct MI300X . Oracle Cloud Infrastructure will deploy zettascale AI clusters with up to 131,072 MI355X .  OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever: "The day will come when AI will do all the things we can do. The reason is the brain is a biological computer, so why can't the digital computer do the same things? "It's funny that we are debating if AI can truly think, as if our biological brain is superior or fundamentally different from a digital brain."
